long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Prismo is a Chrome extension-based AI assistant that integrates AI models from OpenAI, Anthropic, and others to provide intelligent conversation and assistance features.

- Intelligent Dialogue: Integrates AI models from OpenAI, Anthropic, etc., offering high-quality conversation and Q&A services
- Multi-language Support: Interface available in multiple languages to meet diverse user needs
- Customizable Settings: Users can adjust the AI assistant's behavior and appearance according to personal preferences
- Dual Interaction Modes:
  - Popup Window: Quick access to core functions
  - Sidebar: Provides a richer interactive experience and more features
- Context Awareness: Able to understand and analyze the content of the current webpage, providing relevant suggestions and assistance
- Privacy Protection: Strictly adheres to user privacy, does not collect or store sensitive information
